Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
Shoot a charged shot that strikes the target area, dealing Arc damage.
向目标区域发射一道充能射击，造成电弧伤害。
一种远距离重型电弧武器。
More designed for crowd control than damage, this short-range Arc weapon can deliver a massive shock to a unit.
比起造成伤害，这把近距离电弧武器更侧重于进行群体控制，能够给单位造成强力冲击。

Attacks from Arc weapons will now jump to up to {ExtensionJumps} enemy targets within {ExtensionRange} hexes on a successful hit, dealing {ExtensionDamage} damage.[br/]Does not apply to Area of Effect and Melee attacks.
电弧武器成功命中目标后将弹跳至 {ExtensionRange} 单元格范围内最多 {ExtensionJumps} 个敌人身上，造成 {ExtensionDamage} 伤害。[br/]不适用于范围效果和近战攻击。
Damage jumps to {ExtensionJumps} nearby enemy units within {ExtensionRange} hexes.
伤害弹跳至 {ExtensionRange} 单元格范围内最多 {ExtensionJumps} 个附近敌方单位。

Attacks from Arc weapons gain an extra impact level, allowing them to [abilityred]Stagger[/abilityred] enemy units.[br/]Additionally, Arc weapons gain a {StrengthChance}[strengthWave/] strength chance ({StaticChanceRepeating}[strengthwave/] for repeating attacks) to apply [abilityred]Electrified[/abilityred] to non-Ethereal units for {Duration}[turn/].

电弧武器的攻击获得额外冲击等级，能够使敌方单位[abilityred]动摇[/abilityred]。[br/]此外，电弧武器有 {StrengthChance}[strengthWave/] 力量几率（多次攻击有 {StaticChanceRepeating}[strengthwave/] 几率）对非虚灵单位施加[abilityred]触电[/abilityred]，持续 {Duration}[turn/]。

Attacks from Arc weapons have a {StunChance}[strengthwave/] strength chance ({StunChanceRepeating}[strengthwave/] for repeating attacks) to [abilityred]Stun[/abilityred] to non-Ethereal units for {Duration}[turn/].
电弧武器的攻击有 {StunChance}[strengthwave/] 力量几率（重复攻击有 {StunChanceRepeating}[strengthwave/] 几率）[abilityred]晕眩[/abilityred]非虚灵单位，持续 {Duration}[turn/]。

Attacks from Arc weapons have a {StaticStrengthChance}[strengthwave/] strength chance ({StaticChanceRepeating}[strengthwave/] for repeating attacks) to apply [abilityred]Static Charge[/abilityred], a stacking debuff that lowers the target's Arc resistance by {BuildupResistance}[DefenseWave/] for {StaticChargeDuration}[turn/].

电弧武器的攻击有 {StaticStrengthChance}[strengthwave/] 力量几率（重复攻击有 {StaticChanceRepeating}[strengthwave/] 几率）施加[abilityred]静电电荷[/abilityred]，使目标电弧抵抗降低 {BuildupResistance}[DefenseWave/]，持续 {StaticChargeDuration}[turn/]。

Unit becomes statically charged, gaining {DermalArcResistance} resistance. Whenever this unit is damaged by an enemy unit within {DermalHexRange} hexes, that unit has a {StrengthChanceStun} strength chance to become [abilityred]Stunned[/abilityred] and receives {DermalDamageBack} damage.
单位得到静电充能，获得 {DermalArcResistance} 抵抗。每当该单位受到来自 {DermalHexRange} 个单元格内敌方单位的伤害时，敌方单位有 {StrengthChanceStun} 力量几率被 [abilityred]晕眩[/abilityred]并受到 {DermalDamageBack} 伤害。
一种中距离空对空电弧武器。
Call down blasts of electricity to strike nearby units in a {hexrad} hex radius. The unit enters defense mode after using this ability.
呼叫电流冲击攻击 {hexrad} 个单元格范围内的附近单位。单位在使用此技能后将进入防御模式。
Charge the craft's internal capacitors, causing its attacks to [abilityred]Stagger[/abilityred] targets and do {damageBonus} extra damage until the end of its next turn.
充能内置电容，使攻击能够[abilityred]动摇[/abilityred]目标并额外造成 {damageBonus} 伤害，效果持续至下个回合结束。
The units attacks do an extra {damageBonus} damage, and can [abilityred]Stagger[/abilityred] targets.
该单位攻击额外造成 {damageBonus} 伤害并且能够[abilityred]动摇[/abilityred]目标。
Strike the target with an Arc Sword.
Fire a blast of Arc energy at the target.
向目标发射一道电弧冲击波。
Call down bolts of Arc energy from above, striking targets and ignoring cover.
呼叫电弧能量闪电从天而降打击目标，并且无视掩体。

The unit is shrouded in a powerful Arc field, making it {DischargeAccuracyEnemy} harder to hit with ranged attacks and granting it {ArcResistance}[DefenseWave/] resistance. At the start of each turn of combat, a random enemy within a {JumpDistanceRadius} hex radius area of effect gets hit with a discharge, taking {DischargeJumpDamage} damage.
该单位笼罩在一层强大的电弧力场之中，使其被远程攻击命中的难度增加 {DischargeAccuracyEnemy}，并获得 {ArcResistance}[DefenseWave/]抵抗。在每个战斗回合开始时，{JumpDistanceRadius} 个受影响单元格范围内的一名随机敌人将会被卸能命中，受到 {DischargeJumpDamage} 伤害。
Send forth a powerful torrent of Arc energy in a {HexDistance} hex cone.
向 {HexDistance} 个单元格扇形区域发射一道强大的电弧能量流。
Attack the target with Arc-enhanced tendrils.
使用经过电弧强化的触须攻击目标。
Call thunder to strike an area.
呼叫闪电攻击某个区域。
Fire a ship-mounted Arc cannon at the target. Ignores accuracy penalties against Flying units.
向目标发射船载电弧加农炮。如果目标为飞行单位，攻击将无视准度惩罚。
Fire blasts of Arc energy at the target.
向目标发射一道电弧能量冲击波。
Fire blasts of Arc energy at the target.
向目标发射一道电弧能量冲击波。
Throw an advanced bolas to capture and immobilize units.
投掷一条高级流星锤捕获目标并使目标无法移动。
Fire a precise bolt of Arc energy at the target.
向目标发射精准的电弧能量弹。
Fire a snapshot of Arc energy at the target.
向目标发射一道快速的电弧能量。
Fire the Heavy Pulse Cannon at the target, dealing heavy Arc damage with high impact in a {radius} hex radius.
使用重型脉冲加农炮攻击目标，对 {radius} 个单元格范围内的单位造成大量电弧伤害并附带高度冲击。
Fire a lance of Arc energy at the target.
向目标发射一支电弧能量长矛。
Fire Pulse Drivers at the target.
使用脉冲驱动器攻击目标。
Fire the Cataclysm cannon at the target location, dealing damage in a large area of effect.
使用灾难大炮轰击目标地点，造成大片范围伤害。
Fire a powerful, short-range blast. This unit enters [abilityblue]Defense Mode[/abilityblue]afterwards.
发射一道威力巨大的近距离冲击波，此后单位将进入[abilityblue]防御模式[/abilityblue]。
Fire a blast of energy at the target.
向目标发射一道能量冲击波。
Fire a blast of energy at the target.
向目标发射一道能量冲击波。
Load a breaching round that allows the next attack to penetrate {BreachRoundArmor} and {BreachRoundShield}, and gain {AccuracyBonus} accuracy. Does not affect Pulse Sniper Snapshot.
装填一发穿透弹，下次攻击将穿透 {BreachRoundArmor}和 {BreachRoundShield}，并获得 {AccuracyBonus} 准度。对脉冲狙击枪速射无效。
Fire a breaching pulse repeater at the target.
使用穿透脉冲连发枪攻击目标。
Deploy a Pulse Charge into an area, exploding in an Arc field that damages units, applies [abilityred]Static Charge[/abilityred] and leaves a Static Cloud Hazard in the area.
向目标区域部署脉冲电荷，位于电弧力场中将会爆炸并对单位造成伤害，同时施加[abilityred]静电电荷[/abilityred]并在范围内留下一片静电云。
Fire a low damage Arc attack that jumps to nearby enemy units.
发射伤害较低但会弹跳至附近敌方单位身上的电弧攻击。
Discharge a flurry of Arc bolts at the target.
向目标发射一连串电弧爆弹。
Deal Arc damage in a 1 hex radius.
对 1 个单元格范围造成电弧伤害。
忽视 {DefensePenetrationIgnoreArmor} 及 {DefensePenetrationIgnoreShields}，获得 {AccuracyBonus} 准度

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.
